Properties.ProtectedString:
Tool = script.Parent
local stillEquipped = true
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) stillEquipped = true if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end while stillEquipped do print("Setting Mouse to go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" while Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end print("Setting Mouse to wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" while not Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end end end
function onUnequippedLocal() stillEquipped = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)

-- Mace and Shield -- 10% chance to break your joints -- Increases movement by 3 -- Increase health by 60 -- Has the spinning swirl attack -- Shield can block projectiles
local Tool = script.Parent local Sword = Tool.Handle
local shield local shieldMesh
local vCharacter
local damage = 17
Tool.Enabled = true
local debris = game:GetService("Debris")
local chanceToBreak = 12
function blow(hit) -- For the Sword humanoid = hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") vCharacter = Tool.Parent myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) if humanoid ~= nil and myHumanoid ~= nil and myHumanoid ~= humanoid then rightArm = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Right Arm") if rightArm then rightGrip = rightArm:FindFirstChild("RightGrip") if rightGrip and (rightGrip.Part0 == Sword or rightGrip.Part1 == Sword) then tagHumanoid(humanoid, vPlayer) humanoid:TakeDamage(damage) tick() if math.random(1, 100) <= chanceToBreak then if hit then hit:BreakJoints() end end end end end end
function tagHumanoid(humanoid, player) if humanoid ~= nil then creatorTag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creatorTag.Name = "creator" creatorTag.Value = player creatorTag.Parent = humanoid debris:AddItem(creatorTag, 1) end end
function onActivated() vCharacter = Tool.Parent myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") if myTorso == nil then return end end
function onEquipped() print("On Equip") vCharacter = Tool.Parent torso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") if vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Shield") == nil and torso ~= nil then
shield = Instance.new("Part") shield.FormFactor = 3 shield.Name = "Shield" shield.Size = Vector3.new(2, 0.2, 4) shield.Shape = "Block" shield.Parent = vCharacter shield.CanCollide = false
shieldMesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") shieldMesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=68377909" shieldMesh.Scale = Vector3.new(1.3, 1.3, 1.3) shieldMesh.Name = "Mesh" shieldMesh.TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=68377905" shieldMesh.Parent = shield
shieldWeld = Instance.new("Weld") shieldWeld.Part0 = torso shieldWeld.Part1 = shield shieldWeld.Name = "ShieldHolder" shieldWeld.C1 = CFrame.Angles(-math.pi/2, math.pi, 0) * CFrame.new(Vector3.new(0, 0.2, -1.1)) shieldWeld.Parent = torso end end
function onUnequipped() torso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") if torso then shield = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Shield") shieldWeld = torso:FindFirstChild("ShieldHolder") end if shield then shield:Remove() end if shieldWeld then shieldWeld:Remove() end
end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped) Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated) Sword.Touched:connect(blow)

-- KORBLOX! Sword and shield
local Tool = script.Parent local Sword = Tool.Handle
Tool.Enabled = true
local vCharacter local shieldWeld
local shieldWalkAnim local slashAnim local bashAnim local lungeAnim local spinAnim local time
local shieldActive local lastAttack = 0
local bashDamage = 13 local connection
local dashTime = 0 local lastKeyDown = 0
local torsoCFrames = {}
local runService = game:service("RunService")
function slashIt(myHumanoid, myTorso)
spinAnim = myHumanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.SpinAnim) if spinAnim then spinAnim:Play() end
bg = Instance.new("BodyGyro") bg.P = 100000 bg.maxTorque = Vector3.new(bg.P, bg.P, bg.P) bg.Name = "BG"
torsoCFrames[1] = myTorso.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(0, 1*math.pi/3, 0) torsoCFrames[2] = myTorso.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(0, 2*math.pi/3, 0) torsoCFrames[3] = myTorso.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(0, math.pi, 0) torsoCFrames[4] = myTorso.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(0, 4*math.pi/3, 0) torsoCFrames[5] = myTorso.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(0, 5*math.pi/3, 0) torsoCFrames[6] = myTorso.CFrame
bg.Parent = myTorso
for i = 1, 84 do local c = i%6 + 1 if bg then bg.cframe = torsoCFrames[c] end wait(0.025) end
if bg then bg:Remove() end wait(2.0) end
function onKeyDown(key) vCharacter = Tool.Parent myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if myHumanoid == nil then return end if key:lower() == "q" then --Fix implemented by Luckymaxer if vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Shield") then print("Found Shield")
torso = vCharacter.Torso shieldWeld = torso:FindFirstChild("ShieldHolder") leftArm = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Left Arm") if shieldWeld then shieldWeld.Parent = leftArm shieldWeld.Part0 = leftArm
shieldWalkAnim = myHumanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.ShieldWalk) shieldWalkAnim:Play()
shieldWeld.C1 = (shieldWeld.C1 + Vector3.new(-0.3, 0.2, -0.60)) * CFrame.Angles(-math.pi/5, math.pi, math.pi/5) if Tool.ShieldActive then Tool.ShieldActive.Value = 1 end else shieldWeld = leftArm:FindFirstChild("ShieldHolder") if shieldWeld then shieldWeld.Parent = torso shieldWeld.Part0 = torso shieldWeld.C1 = CFrame.Angles(-math.pi/2, math.pi, 0) * CFrame.new(Vector3.new(0, 0.2, -1.1)) end if shieldWalkAnim then shieldWalkAnim:Stop() end if Tool.ShieldActive then Tool.ShieldActive.Value = 0 end end end end if key == "w" then t = runService.Stepped:wait() if (t - lastKeyDown < 0.2) then dashTime = t end lastKeyDown = t end end
function bash(hit) if hit.Anchored == false then humanoid = hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") vCharacter = Tool.Parent myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") local opponent = hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Torso") myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) if humanoid ~=nil and myHumanoid ~= nil and myHumanoid ~= humanoid then leftArm = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Left Arm") if leftArm then shieldGrip = leftArm:FindFirstChild("ShieldHolder") if shieldGrip and shieldGrip.Part1 == shield then tagHumanoid(humanoid, vPlayer) humanoid:TakeDamage(bashDamage) wait(1.0) if bv then bv:Remove() end untagHumanoid(humanoid) if connection then connection:disconnect() end end end end end end
function tagHumanoid(humanoid, player) if humanoid ~= nil then creatorTag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creatorTag.Name = "creator" creatorTag.Value = player creatorTag.Parent = humanoid end end
function untagHumanoid(humanoid) if humanoid ~= nil then tag = humanoid:FindFirstChild("creator") if tag ~= nil then tag:Remove() end end end
function onActivatedLocal() if Tool.Enabled == false then return end
vCharacter = Tool.Parent myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") if myHumanoid == nil or myTorso == nil then return end
Tool.Enabled = false
shieldActive = Tool:FindFirstChild("ShieldActive")
shield = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Shield")
--slashAnim = myHumanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.QuickSlash) bashAnim = myHumanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.ShieldBash)
t = runService.Stepped:wait() if t - dashTime < 0.2 and shieldActive.Value == 1 then slashIt(myHumanoid, myTorso) wait(0.5) amAnimating = false else if bashAnim then bashAnim:Play() end if shield then connection = shield.Touched:connect(bash) end wait(0.6) amAnimating = false end wait(0.5) Tool.Enabled = true end
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) vCharacter = Tool.Parent mouse.KeyDown:connect(onKeyDown) end
function onUnequippedLocal() if shieldWalkAnim then shieldWalkAnim:Stop() end if slashAnim then slashAnim:Stop() end if bashAnim then bashAnim:Stop() end if spinAnim then spinAnim:Stop() end
if Tool.ShieldActive then Tool.ShieldActive.Value = 0 end
if vCharacter then leftArm = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Left Arm") if leftArm then shield = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Shield") shieldWeld = leftArm:FindFirstChild("ShieldHolder") end myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") end if connection then connection:disconnect() end if shield then shield:Remove() end if shieldWeld then shieldWeld:Remove() end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal) Tool.Activated:connect(onActivatedLocal)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Tool = script.Parent
ShieldActive = Tool:WaitForChild("ShieldActive")
LastValue = ShieldActive.Value
ShieldActive.Changed:connect(function() if Humanoid then if ShieldActive.Value == 0 and Humanoid.MaxHealth > 100 then ratio = Humanoid.Health / Humanoid.MaxHealth Humanoid.Health = ratio * 100 Humanoid.MaxHealth = 100 elseif ShieldActive.Value == 1 then ratio = Humanoid.Health / Humanoid.MaxHealth Humanoid.MaxHealth = 175 wait(0.2) Humanoid.Health = Humanoid.Health + (ratio * 75) end end end)
function Equipped(Mouse) Character = Tool.Parent Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") end
Tool.Equipped:connect(Equipped)
